name: hv_ion_message_t
desc: The structure that describes the Mach message that the Hypervisor sends when an I/O notifier delivers the notifications you request.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new I/O notifier message.

items.name: init(header: mach_msg_header_t, addr: UInt64, size: UInt64, value: UInt64, trailer: mach_msg_trailer_t)
items.desc: Creates a new I/O notifier message with the parameters you provide.

items.name: var addr: UInt64
items.desc: The address of the I/O write.

items.name: var size: UInt64
items.desc: The size of the value written by the notifier.

items.name: var value: UInt64
items.desc: An unsigned 64-bit integer that represents the contents of an I/O notifier message.
